compliance_report.summary: The company demonstrates strong compliance in packaging and labeling for certain products but faces critical gaps in ingredient compliance and vegan certification. Immediate action is required to address non-compliant ingredients and labeling discrepancies.
compliance_report.dramatic_narrative: In a world where consumer trust is the ultimate currency, our company stands at a crossroads. While our coffee products shine with compliant packaging and clear labeling, our food products lag in a sea of uncertainty. The absence of additive approvals and vegan certifications threatens to undermine our reputation. The journey ahead demands swift, decisive action to reformulate, certify, and declare our compliance boldly.

by_amendment.amendment_title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Food Products Standards and Food Additives) Amendment Regulations, 2025
by_amendment.current_state: Ingredients are listed, but their compliance with additive regulations remains unverified.
by_amendment.to_be_done: Verify additive compliance, obtain necessary certifications, and file compliance declarations.

by_amendment.amendment_title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Vegan Foods) Amendment Regulations, 2025
by_amendment.current_state: Products contain animal-derived ingredients without proper labeling.
by_amendment.to_be_done: Decide product status, reformulate if vegan, and obtain certification.

by_amendment.amendment_title: Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Amendment Regulations, 2025
by_amendment.current_state: Labels include mandatory elements like product name, net weight, and storage instructions.
by_amendment.to_be_done: Maintain compliance and ensure all products meet labeling standards.
gaps: Missing nutrition facts for some products

by_amendment.amendment_title: Food Safety and Standards (Packaging) First Amendment Regulations, 2025
by_amendment.current_state: Packaging meets safety and environmental standards.
by_amendment.to_be_done: Ensure ongoing compliance with packaging regulations.
